text: Velli Vizha () is a 1972 Indian Tamil film, directed by K. Balachander and produced by B. Duraisami. The film stars Gemini Ganesan, Jayanthi, Vanisri and S. Varalakshmi in lead roles. The film had musical score by V. Kumar. ==Cast== * Gemini Ganesan as Bala * Jayanthi as Banu * Vanisri as Sheela * S. Varalakshmi as Sivakami * V. Gopalakrishnan as Joseph * Thengai Srinivasan as Aramuthan * Manorama as Komalam * S. V. Sahasranamam as Kumarasamy * Srividya as Kalyani * Vidhubala * K. R. Savitri as Radha * Shanmugasundaram as Raja * V. S. Raghavan Church Father ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by V. Kumar. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !!
